title: Potential energy of spring when stretched

content.question: A specially designed spring is stretched from equilibrium to the distances x given in the table above, and the restoring force F is measured and recorded in each case. What is the potential energy of the spring when it is stretched 3 m from equilibrium?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
